subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
Soccer
lead_paragraph: After becoming coach of the United States women’s soccer team in 2008, Pia Sundhage has instituted cultural and tactical change for the team, using a laid-back style of coaching and encouraging songs.
snippet: After becoming coach of the United States women’s soccer team in 2008, Pia Sundhage has instituted cultural and tactical change for the team, using a laid-back style of coaching and encouraging songs.
